data.eml:eml: Review of the Old World leafhopper genus Mimotettix Matsumura (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) with description of new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dai, Wu, Zhang, Yalin (2010): Review of the Old World leafhopper genus Mimotettix Matsumura (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) with description of new species. Zootaxa 2651: 1-26, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.198836
